title: F/S T205 Richard Hoblitzell No Stats PSA 2.5
author: trambo

posts.post_title: F/S T205 Richard Hoblitzell No Stats PSA 2.5
posts.post_content:
Cross posted on ebay.  Available is the Hoblitzell No Stats PSA 2.5.  

I recently upgraded (although I like the appeal of this one more versus the one I just picked up) and I really don't need 2 of them.

Asking price is $29,000 net of any fees and includes registered mail shipping to you.  Happy to meet up for hand delivery within a few hours of central Ohio as well.  

Feel free to PM with questions.  Partial trades would be considered as well.

thanks!

Troy Rambo
